author: nbubna
msg: VELOCITY-541: Completely revamp how repositories are created and stored to allow for
2) StringResourceRepository(s) to be stored statically or in application attributes
3) named StringResourceRepository(s) to avoid namespace collisions
4) ability to clear out static repositories to plug possible memory leak

msg: Checkbox and Radio: added checked="true/false" attribute to force checked or not checked, changed checkedValue(s) to currentValue(s) to hopefully be clearer
